# Silent Fist

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Taijutsu, Fighting Style
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Short
- Users: Shira
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
The is a fighting style unique to Shira. With it he is able to render his movements completely silent by cloaking himself in chakra.
